root.name: Elements of War
root.description: OverviewElements of War is a real-time strategy game for the PC. Developed by Lestra Studio and released on April 18, 2011, Elements of War lets players control German, US and Russian forces whilst using a number of weapons based around manipulating the earth's climate and natural elements.System RequirementsMinimum:OS: Windows XP / Vista / Windows 7CPU: Intel Pentium 4 @ 3.0 GHz / AMD Athlon 64 3200+RAM: 2 GBHDD: 4 GB free disk spaceGraphics Card: 256 MB nVidia GeForce 7600 / ATI Radeon X1600Sound Card: DirectX 9 CompatibleDirectX: Version 9Recommended:CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 3.0 GHz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+ (or better)RAM: 4 GBGraphics Card: 512 MB nVidia GeForce 8800 / ATI Radeon HD 4700 (or better)
